properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 7:40PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Gainesville
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River at Demopolis Lock and
Dam...

.Recent rainfall has resulted in rises along the Tombigbee River. Various river
points are in minor flood stage and are forecast to remain in minor flood over
the next several days. The latest forecast shows Demopolis coming very close to
reaching moderate flood stage Friday and into the weekend. Please check back for
updated forecasts.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  7:15 PM Tuesday the stage was 106.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 101.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 109.0 feet by
Thursday morning then begin falling.
* Impact...At 109.0 feet...Flooding of some camps and cabins...as well
as widespread flooding of low-lying woods and agricultural lands...
occurs, especially ustream of the lock and dam.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning, or sooner if
conditions warrant.
